name: Leave Hank The Tank Alone
description:
Manifesto 

This is a game project that made us learn about bitsy and how well we can create something out of it, this is nothing amazing but it is the story of Hank the Tank a 500-pound bear going into people's houses. This shows how the bear entered houses just to get something to eat and never do any harm to anyone. I am still learning bitsy so I had many problems with making it do things I wanted it to do, so I had to change my plans a lot.

Aritcle: https://www.newsbreak.com/news/2524985085418/hank-the-tank-is-innocent-update-co...
